description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d26p7","text":"Whole-mount Immunohistochemistry – acetone permeabilization ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3b3v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b351v","text":"Works with anti-MAGUK ab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efju2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"563p6","text":"Modified from M Westerfield protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at81h","text":"Lavinia Sheets: T. Nicolson Lab September, 2010 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dqe4","text":"Revised August 2011 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmpa","text":"Anya Suppermpool Synaptic (MAGUK) Version 2018","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cftql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o6p7","text":"Anya's Benchling Protocol Archive at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v26c","text":"https://benchling.com/s/prt-nLJhuyARGTPcTi887wL1?m=slm-FGIOfoYTo8bWHpVnUZ0v","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":75}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6EDF6C7AC71C11EDA5DC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://benchling.com/s/prt-nLJhuyARGTPcTi887wL1?m=slm-FGIOfoYTo8bWHpVnUZ0v"}}}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"3veo1","text":"PO4buffer
8 parts0.1MNaH2PO4
2 parts0.1MNa2HPO4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"sub","offset":2,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":42,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":46,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v2ct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpbdn","text":"BT buffer (make fresh)
1.0gsucrose
18.75µL0.2MCaCl2
PO4buffer to15mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":22},{"style":"sub","offset":50,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3r42","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8uuvh","text":"BT fix (make fresh)
1.2mLPO4buffer
4.8mLBT buffer
2mL16% PFA (used bought Thermofisher fix)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tcpm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n8m4","text":"PBS/BSA/DMSO
50mLPBS
0.5gBSA
500µLDMSO","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1vrlg","text":"Tricaine, Dechorionated beforehand (2dpf) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6f5t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdtcb","text":"Fix 1.5-2h in BT fix (*use bought fix) at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjo9m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eshor","text":"Replace fixative with PO4 buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"963nl","text":"(Optional) Store at 4C overnight (shaking not necessary)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i1pd","text":" (less fix time higher SNR but mushy) 5h fixation works for 5dpf – 9dpf larvae, time may need to be adjusted for different ages","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3srp","text":"Wash for 5’ RT with shaking if continuing with permeabilization and blocking in same day","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dmh3","text":"Chill a small volume (~50mL glass bottle) acetone at -20C at least 20’ prior to perm steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h73g","text":"(optional) if rushed/forgotten, put acetone in -80C for a few minutes, but this could lead to over-permeabilization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbl1a","text":"Transfer larvae to glass vials using glass Pasteur pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p4jk","text":" Larvae will be sticky so be careful while transferring between tubes!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40eai","text":"Wash with dH2O 5’ RT with rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84i5d","text":"*Timing is critical for permeabilization steps*—process tubes in same order for each step and adjust volume of solutions to allow for quick handling ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ssmv","text":"Wash with cold acetone 5’ at -20C (put in freezer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq8bb","text":"Wash with dH2O 5’ RT with rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r0ba","text":"This step can go slightly longer (~10’) if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fjr2a","text":" Wash with PO4, 5’ at RT (Lavinia’s original protocol extra step)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jpf2","text":"Block \u003e2h RT in PBS/BSA/DMSO + 2% goat serum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2plvc","text":"(optional) can go overnight at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cv2qj","text":" Incubate in primary antibodies in PBS/BSA/DMSO 4C overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qh30","text":"Use ~1mL antibody mix per tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35ljt","text":"Remove primary antibody mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"425v7","text":"Add 1:1000 20%NaN3to mix if saving for future use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":17,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egn58","text":"Wash 5X+ withPBS/BSA/DMSO \u003e20’ RT with rocking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"236sp","text":"(optional) any washes after antibody incubation can go overnight at 4C if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frj65","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jed5","text":"Incubate with secondary antibodies inPBS/BSA/DMSO 2-3h at RT or overnight at 4C in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ashi7","text":"Wash 3X withPBS/BSA/DMSO \u003e20’ RT with rocking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh567","text":"(Wash withPBS/BSA/DMSO + DAPI (1:2000 dilution) \u003e20’ RT with rocking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"69l0b","text":"Wash withPBS\u003e20’ RT with rocking like 5x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5gju","text":"Move to glycerol – 20%,40%,60%,80%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5g55m","text":"Mount and image using glycerol lens (did 20x before)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a79gq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkh45","text":"Anti-MAGUK1:500MABN72 Anti-pan-MAGUK, clone K28/86tRFP1:500Anti-tRFP Rabbit Polyclonal (AB233 - evrogen)Fix#28906ThermoFisher  (from Ana Faro)","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":142}],"data":{}},{"key":"9b7io","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":""},"colTitles":["Reagents\n","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["Anti-MAGUK","1:500","MABN72 Anti-pan-MAGUK, clone K28/86"],["Fix","#28906","ThermoFisher  (from Ana Faro)"],["tRFP","1:500","Anti-tRFP Rabbit Polyclonal (AB233 - evrogen)"]],"guid":"4EC739F7C71C11EDA5DC0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Anti-MAGUK","1:500","MABN72 Anti-pan-MAGUK, clone K28/86"],["Fix","#28906","ThermoFisher  (from Ana Faro)"],["tRFP","1:500","Anti-tRFP Rabbit Polyclonal (AB233 - evrogen)"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mn84","text":"PO4buffer\n8 parts0.1MNaH2PO4\n2 parts0.1MNa2HPO4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"sub","offset":2,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":42,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":46,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sb00","text":"BT buffer (make fresh)
1.0gsucrose
18.75µL0.2MCaCl2
PO4buffer to15mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":22},{"style":"sub","offset":50,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28lt1","text":"BT fix (make fresh)
1.2mLPO4buffer
4.8mLBT buffer
2mL16% PFA (used bought Thermofisher fix)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"sub","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49pc1","text":"PBS/BSA/DMSO
50mLPBS
0.5gBSA
500µLDMSO","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Synaptic immunohistochemistry - wholemount via acetone permeabilization
